hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from User user where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(loginName) || isNotBlank(userName) || isNotBlank(remark)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(loginName)> or lower(user.loginName) like '%${loginName?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(userName)> or lower(user.userName) like '%${loginName?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(remark)> or lower(user.remark) = lower(:remark) </if> <if isNotBlank(sex)> or lower(user.sex) = lower(:sex) </if> ) </if> and exists (select uuid from DepartmentUserJob department_user_job where department_user_job.user.uuid = user.uuid and department_user_job.department.uuid in (:departmentUuids) ) order by ${orderBy}
